text: Robert Paul Marie de Guise (5 June 1872 – 7 December 1940) was a colonial administrator in various colonies of the French Colonial Empire. ==Titles Held== ==References== Category:1872 births Category:1940 deaths Category:Governors of French Guinea Category:Governors of French Equatorial Africa Category:French Governors of Martinique Category:Governors of French India Category:People of French West Africa
title: Robert Paul Marie de Guise
